mov (x,y) (dir,len) =

inside s d j = ( (s <= j) && (j <= d) ) || ( (d <= j) && (j <= s) )

pick :: (Int,Int) -> (Int,Int) -> [(Int,Int)] -> [(Int,Int)]
pick _ _ [] = []
pick s@(sx,sy) d@(dx,dy) (j@(jx,jy):js) =
  if (inside sx dx jx) && (inside sy dy jy)
  then pick s d js
  else j:(pick s d js)

ans' :: [(Int,Int)] -> (Int,Int) -> [(String,Int)] -> [(Int,Int)]
ans' [] _ _ = []
ans' j s [] = [s]
ans' j s (c:cs) =
  let d = mov s c
      j'= pick s d j
  in
    ans' j' d cs

ans x =
  let n = read $ head $ head x :: Int

      m = read $ head $ head $ drop (n+1) x :: Int
      c = map (\[a,b]->(a,read b)) $ take m $ drop (n+2) x :: [(String,Int)]
      r = drop (n+m+2) x
      a = ans' j (10,10) c
      b = if a == [] then "Yes" else "No"
  in
    if n == 0 then [] else (b:(ans r))

import Control.Applicative
import Control.Monad
import Data.List
import Data.Bool (bool)

main :: IO ()
main = do
  n <- readLn
  unless (n == 0) $ do
    ts <- replicateM n f
    m <- readLn
    solve ts <$> replicateM m g >>= putStrLn
    main
  where
    f = map read <$> words <$> getLine
    g = (\[d, l] -> (head d, read l)) <$> words <$> getLine

solve :: [[Int]] -> [(Char, Int)] -> String
solve ts = bool "No" "Yes" . null . snd . foldl' f ((10, 10), ts)
  where
    f ((cx, cy), ts) ('N', l) = ((cx, cy + l), filter (\[x, y] -> x /= cx || y `notElem` [cy .. cy + l]) ts)
    f ((cx, cy), ts) ('S', l) = ((cx, cy - l), filter (\[x, y] -> x /= cx || y `notElem` [cy - l .. cy]) ts)
    f ((cx, cy), ts) ('E', l) = ((cx + l, cy), filter (\[x, y] -> y /= cy || x `notElem` [cx .. cx + l]) ts)
    f ((cx, cy), ts) ('W', l) = ((cx - l, cy), filter (\[x, y] -> y /= cy || x `notElem` [cx - l .. cx]) ts)

  where

    loop nGem = do
      gems <- getGemPos nGem

      -- print gems

      let (newPos, newGot) =
            foldl (\(curPos, curGot) -> \move -> processMove curPos curGot move gems)

      -- print (newPos, newGot)

movePos :: Move -> Pos -> Pos
movePos ("N", n) (x, y) = (x, y+n)
movePos ("S", n) (x, y) = (x, y-n)
movePos ("W", n) (x, y) = (x-n, y)
movePos ("E", n) (x, y) = (x+n, y)

processMove :: Pos -> [Bool] -> Move -> [Pos] -> (Pos, [Bool])
processMove pos got move gems =
  aux (snd move) pos got (fst move, 1) gems
  where aux 0 pos got _ _ = (pos, got)
        aux n pos got move gems =
          let (newPos, newGot) = processMove1 pos got move gems
          in aux (n-1) newPos newGot move gems

processMove1 :: Pos -> [Bool] -> Move -> [Pos] -> (Pos, [Bool])
processMove1 pos got move gems =
  let newPos = movePos move pos
      index = elemIndex newPos gems
      newGot = maybe got (\i -> (take i got) ++ [True] ++ (drop (i+1) got)) index
  in
     (newPos, newGot)

readPos :: String -> Pos
readPos s = let [x, y] = map read $ words s in (x, y)

readMove :: String -> Move
readMove s = let [d, n] = words s in (d, read n :: Int)

getGemPos :: Int -> IO [Pos]
getGemPos n = replicateM n (liftM readPos getLine)

getMove :: Int -> IO [Move]
getMove n = replicateM n (liftM readMove getLine)

def dir2num(str)
  case str
  when 'N' then [0, 1]
  when 'E' then [1, 0]
  when 'S' then [0, -1]
  when 'W' then [-1, 0]
  end
end

def move_robot(arr)
  $r.each do |arr|
    arr[1].to_i.times do
      $moved_pos << $pos = $pos.zip(dir2num(arr[0])).map{ |a| a.inject(:+) }
    end
  end
end

class Robot
  attr_reader :map, :x, :y, :ngem

  def initialize(map, x, y)
    @map = map
    @x = x
    @y = y
    @ngem = 0
  end

  def go(dir, n)
    vx = 0
    vy = 0
    case dir
    when 'N'
      vy = 1
    when 'S'
      vy = -1
    when 'E'
      vx = 1
    when 'W'
      vx = -1
    end

    n.times do |i|
      @x += vx
      @y += vy

      if @map[@y][@x]
        @ngem += 1
        @map[@y][@x] = nil
      end
    end
  end  
end

class Position
	attr_accessor :x, :y
	
	def initialize(x, y)
		@x = x
		@y = y
	end
	
	def +(move)
		@x += move.x
		@y += move.y
	end
end

DIRECTIONS = {
	'N' => Position.new(0, 1),
	'E' => Position.new(1, 0),
	'S' => Position.new(0, -1),
	'W' => Position.new(-1, 0),
}

while (gems_number = gets.to_i) != 0
	current_position = Position.new(10, 10)
	gems = []
	
	gems_number.times do
		x, y = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
		gems << Position.new(x, y)
	end
	
	order_number = gets.to_i
	
	order_number.times do
		direction, amount = gets.split
		
		amount.to_i.times do
			current_position + DIRECTIONS[direction]
			gems.reject! { |gem| gem.x == current_position.x && gem.y == current_position.y }
		end
	end
	
	if gems.empty?
		puts "Yes"
	else
		puts "No"
	end
end

class RobotMove
  def run
    loop do
      @arr = Array.new(21).map! { Array.new(21,0) }

      number = gets.to_i
      break if number == 0
      
      set(number)
      
      move
      
      puts (@arr.select { |x| x.include?(1) == true }.size == 0)? "Yes": "No"
    end
  end
  
  def set(number)
    number.times do line = gets.split.map(&:to_i); @arr[line[0]][line[1]] = 1 end
  end
  
  def move
    x = 10
    y = 10
    gets.to_i.times do line = gets.split
      line[1].to_i.times do
        case line[0]
          when "N"; y+=1
          when "E"; x+=1
          when "S"; y-=1
          when "W"; x-=1
        end
        @arr[x][y] = 0
      end
    end  
  end
end

def get_answer(n, m, gems_coordinate, operation_set, answers)
  visited_coordinate = []
  now = [10,10]
  operation_set.each do |ope|
    if ope[0] == "N"
      ope[1].times do
        now[1] += 1
        visited_coordinate << Marshal.load(Marshal.dump(now))
      end
    end
    if ope[0] == "E"
      ope[1].times do
        now[0] += 1
        visited_coordinate << Marshal.load(Marshal.dump(now))
      end
    end
    if ope[0] == "S"
      ope[1].times do
        now[1] += -1
        visited_coordinate << Marshal.load(Marshal.dump(now))
      end
    end
    if ope[0] == "W"
      ope[1].times do
        now[0] += -1
        visited_coordinate << Marshal.load(Marshal.dump(now))
      end
    end
  end
  gems_coordinate.each do |g|
    flag = false
    visited_coordinate.each do |v|
      flag = true if v[0] == g[0] && v[1] == g[1]
    end
    return answers << "NO" if flag == false
  end
  return  answers << "YES"
end

def dir2num(str)
  case str
  when 'N' then [0, 1]
  when 'E' then [1, 0]
  when 'S' then [0, -1]
  when 'W' then [-1, 0]
  end
end

def move_robot(arr)
  $r.each do |arr|
    arr[1].to_i.times do
      $moved_pos << $pos = $pos.zip(dir2num(arr[0])).map{ |a| a.inject(:+) }
    end
  end
end

class Robot
  attr_accessor :position
  def initialize(position)
    @position = position
  end
  def move(dir, length)
    if dir == "N"
      @position[:y] += length
    elsif dir == "E"
      @position[:x] += length
    elsif dir == "S"
      @position[:y] -= length
    elsif dir == "W"
      @position[:x] -= length
    end
    return @position
  end
end
def delete_cross_gem(start_pos, end_pos, gems)
  puts "======"
  p start_pos
  p end_pos
  p gems
  puts "======"
  if start_pos[:x] == end_pos[:x]
    gem_on_x = gems.select{|item| item[:x] == start_pos[:x]}
    min = start_pos[:y] < end_pos[:y] ? start_pos[:y] : end_pos[:y]
    max = start_pos[:y] >= end_pos[:y] ? start_pos[:y] : end_pos[:y]
    delete_gems = gem_on_x.select{|item| (item[:y] <= max && item[:y] >= min)}
  else
    gem_on_y = gems.select{|item| item[:y] == start_pos[:y]}
    min = start_pos[:x] < end_pos[:x] ? start_pos[:x] : end_pos[:x]
    max = start_pos[:x] >= end_pos[:x] ? start_pos[:x] : end_pos[:x]
    delete_gems = gem_on_y.select{|item| (item[:x] <= max && item[:x] >= min)}
  end
  puts "======"
  p delete_gems
  puts "======"
  delete_gems.each do |g|
    gems.delete(g)
  end
end

class Vector
  attr_accessor :x, :y

  def initialize(x, y)
    @x, @y = x.to_f, y.to_f
  end

  def -(other)
    dx = @x - other.x
    dy = @y - other.y
    Vector.new(dx, dy)
  end

  def magnitude
    Math.sqrt(@x * @x + @y * @y)
  end

  def self.cross(pt1, pt2)
    pt1.x * pt2.y - pt1.y * pt2.x
  end
end

class Command
  attr_accessor :direction, :distance

  def initialize(direction, distance)
    @direction, @distance = direction, distance.to_f
  end
end

class DataSet
  START_POINT = Vector.new(10, 10)
  attr_reader :gem_locations, :commands, :line_segments

  def initialize(gem_locations, commands)
    @gem_locations, @commands = gem_locations, commands
    @line_segments = get_line_segments
  end

  private
  def get_line_segments
    line_segments = []
    current = START_POINT.clone
    @commands.each { |command|
      dx, dy = 0, 0
      case command.direction
      when 'N'
        dy = command.distance
      when 'E'
        dx = command.distance
      when 'S'
        dy = -command.distance
      when 'W'
        dx = -command.distance
      end

      start = current.clone
      current.x += dx
      current.y += dy
      line_segments << [start, current.clone]
    }
    line_segments
  end
end

def read_data(filename)
  datasets = []
  open(filename, 'r') { |f|
    loop {
      # Read number of gems
      n_gems = f.gets.to_i
      break if n_gems.nil? or n_gems.to_i == 0

      # Read gem locations
      gem_locations = []
      n_gems.times {
        x, y = f.gets.split(/\s+/).map(&:to_i)
        gem_locations << Vector.new(x, y)
      }

      # Read number of commands
      n_commnands = f.gets.to_i

      # Read commands
      commands = []
      n_commnands.times {
        direction, distance = f.gets.split(/\s+/)
        commands << Command.new(direction, distance.to_i)
      }
      datasets << DataSet.new(gem_locations, commands)
    }
  }
  datasets
end

def dot(pt1, pt2)
  pt1.x * pt2.x + pt1.y * pt2.y
end

def distance(vec0, vec1)
  Vector.cross(vec0, vec1).abs / vec0.magnitude
end

filename = ARGV[0]
datasets = read_data(filename)

datasets.each { |dataset|
  judge = [false] * dataset.gem_locations.size
  dataset.gem_locations.each_with_index { |location, i|
    dataset.line_segments.each { |line_segment|
      next if dot(line_segment[1] - line_segment[0], location - line_segment[0]) < 0
      next if dot(line_segment[0] - line_segment[1], location - line_segment[1]) < 0

      vec0 = line_segment[1] - line_segment[0]
      vec1 = location - line_segment[0]
      d = distance(vec0, vec1)
      if d < 0.1
        judge[i] = true
        break
      end
    }
  }
  puts judge.all? ? 'Yes' : 'No'
}

    when 'S' then (1..m).each{ |i| gems[x][y-i] = 0 }; y -= m;
    when 'W' then (1..m).each{ |i| gems[x-i][y] = 0 }; x -= m; end
  end
  if gems.flatten.all?{|v| v == 0} then puts "Yes"
  else puts "No"
  end
end

def dir2num(str)
  case str
  when 'N' then [0, 1]
  when 'E' then [1, 0]
  when 'S' then [0, -1]
  when 'W' then [-1, 0]
  end
end

    arr[1].to_i.times do
      $moved_pos << $pos = $pos.zip(dir2num(arr[0])).map{ |a| a.inject(:+) }
    end
  end
end

class Robot
  attr_accessor :position
  def initialize(position)
    @position = position
  end
  def move(dir, length)
    if dir == "N"
      @position[:y] += length
    elsif dir == "E"
      @position[:x] += length
    elsif dir == "S"
      @position[:y] -= length
    elsif dir == "W"
      @position[:x] -= length
    end
    return @position
  end
end
def delete_cross_gem(start_pos, end_pos, gems)
  if start_pos[:x] == end_pos[:x]
    gem_on_x = gems.select{|item| item[:x] == start_pos[:x]}
    min = start_pos[:y] < end_pos[:y] ? start_pos[:y] : end_pos[:y]
    max = start_pos[:y] >= end_pos[:y] ? start_pos[:y] : end_pos[:y]
    delete_gems = gem_on_x.select{|item| (item[:y] <= max && item[:y] >= min)}
  else
    gem_on_y = gems.select{|item| item[:y] == start_pos[:y]}
    min = start_pos[:x] < end_pos[:x] ? start_pos[:x] : end_pos[:x]
    max = start_pos[:x] >= end_pos[:x] ? start_pos[:x] : end_pos[:x]
    delete_gems = gem_on_y.select{|item| (item[:x] <= max && item[:x] >= min)}
  end
  delete_gems.each do |g|
    gems.delete(g)
  end
end

require 'stringio'

class Vector
  attr_accessor :x, :y

  def initialize(x, y)
    @x, @y = x.to_f, y.to_f
  end

  def -(other)
    dx = @x - other.x
    dy = @y - other.y
    Vector.new(dx, dy)
  end

  def magnitude
    Math.sqrt(@x * @x + @y * @y)
  end

  def self.cross(pt1, pt2)
    pt1.x * pt2.y - pt1.y * pt2.x
  end
end

class Command
  attr_accessor :direction, :distance

  def initialize(direction, distance)
    @direction, @distance = direction, distance.to_f
  end
end

class DataSet
  START_POINT = Vector.new(10, 10)
  attr_reader :gem_locations, :commands, :line_segments

  def initialize(gem_locations, commands)
    @gem_locations, @commands = gem_locations, commands
    @line_segments = get_line_segments
  end

  private
  def get_line_segments
    line_segments = []
    current = START_POINT.clone
    @commands.each { |command|
      dx, dy = 0, 0
      case command.direction
      when 'N'
        dy = command.distance
      when 'E'
        dx = command.distance
      when 'S'
        dy = -command.distance
      when 'W'
        dx = -command.distance
      end

      start = current.clone
      current.x += dx
      current.y += dy
      line_segments << [start, current.clone]
    }
    line_segments
  end
end

def read_data(data)
  datasets = []
  StringIO.open(data, 'r') { |f|
    loop {
      # Read number of gems
      n_gems = f.gets.to_i
      break if n_gems.nil? or n_gems.to_i == 0

      # Read gem locations
      gem_locations = []
      n_gems.times {
        x, y = f.gets.split(/\s+/).map(&:to_i)
        gem_locations << Vector.new(x, y)
      }

      # Read number of commands
      n_commnands = f.gets.to_i

      # Read commands
      commands = []
      n_commnands.times {
        direction, distance = f.gets.split(/\s+/)
        commands << Command.new(direction, distance.to_i)
      }
      datasets << DataSet.new(gem_locations, commands)
    }
  }
  datasets
end

def dot(pt1, pt2)
  pt1.x * pt2.x + pt1.y * pt2.y
end

def distance(vec0, vec1)
  Vector.cross(vec0, vec1).abs / vec0.magnitude
end

  judge = [false] * dataset.gem_locations.size
  dataset.gem_locations.each_with_index { |location, i|
    dataset.line_segments.each { |line_segment|
      next if dot(line_segment[1] - line_segment[0], location - line_segment[0]) < 0
      next if dot(line_segment[0] - line_segment[1], location - line_segment[1]) < 0

      vec0 = line_segment[1] - line_segment[0]
      vec1 = location - line_segment[0]
      d = distance(vec0, vec1)
      if d < 0.1
        judge[i] = true
        break
      end
    }
  }
  puts judge.all? ? 'Yes' : 'No'
}

<?php
function first_check($sorted, $pre, $post) {
//    foreach ($sorted as $k => $v) {
//        if ($pre <= $v) {
//            break;
//        }
//        unset($sorted[$k]);
//    }
//    foreach (array_reverse($sorted, true) as $k => $v) {
//        if ($v <= $post) {
//            break;
//        }
//        unset($sorted[$k]);
//    }

    $keys = [];
    for ($cur = $pre; $cur <= $post; $cur++) {

        if (empty($sorted)) {
            return $keys;
        }

        do {
            $value = reset($sorted);
            if ($cur < $value) {
                continue 2;
            }
            $key = key($sorted);
            unset($sorted[$key]);

            if ($cur == $value) {
                $keys[] = $key;
            }

        } while ($sorted);
    }
    return $keys;
}

function second_check($sorted, $keys, $cur) {
    foreach ($keys as $k => $key) {
        if ($sorted[$key] != $cur) {
            unset($keys[$k]);
        }
    }
    return $keys;
}

function found(&$gems, &$state, $d, $l) {
    $keys = [];

    switch ($d) {
        case 'N':
            $keys = first_check($gems['y'], $state[1], $state[1] + $l);
            $keys = second_check($gems['x'], $keys, $state[0]);
            $state[1] += $l;
            break;
        case 'E':
            $keys = first_check($gems['x'], $state[0], $state[0] + $l);
            $keys = second_check($gems['y'], $keys, $state[1]);
            $state[0] += $l;
            break;
        case 'S':
            $keys = first_check($gems['y'], $state[1] - $l, $state[1]);
            $keys = second_check($gems['x'], $keys, $state[0]);
            $state[1] -= $l;
            break;
        case 'W':
            $keys = first_check($gems['x'], $state[0] - $l, $state[0]);
            $keys = second_check($gems['y'], $keys, $state[1]);
            $state[0] -= $l;
            break;
    }

    foreach ($keys as $key) {
        unset($gems['x'][$key]);
        unset($gems['y'][$key]);
    }
}

function process() {
    $n = fgets(STDIN);
    if ($n == 0) {
        return;
    }

    $gems = ['x' => [], 'y' => []];
    for ($i = 0; $i < $n; $i++) {
        fscanf(STDIN, "%d %d", $x, $y);
//        list($x, $y) = explode(' ', fgets(STDIN));
        $gems['x'][$i] = (int) $x;
        $gems['y'][$i] = (int) $y;
    }

    asort($gems['x']);
    asort($gems['y']);

    $state = [10, 10];
    $m = fgets(STDIN);
    for ($j = 0; $j < $m; $j++) {
        fscanf(STDIN, "%c %d", $d, $l);
//        list($d, $l) = explode(' ', fgets(STDIN));
        found($gems, $state, $d, $l);
    }

    if ($gems['x']) {
        echo 'No' . PHP_EOL;
    } else {
        echo 'Yes' . PHP_EOL;
    }

    process();
}

def between(x, y, a):
    lrg = max(x, y)
    sml = min(x, y)
    if (sml <= a <= lrg):
        return True
    else:
        return False

while (True):
    pos = [10, 10]
    result = 'No'
    N = int(input()) # Total number of jewels
    if N == 0:
        break
    jewelPositions = list()
    for i in range(N):
        jewelPos = list(map(int, input().split()))
        jewelPositions.append(jewelPos)

    M = int(input()) # Number of instructions
    # instructions = list()
    for i in range(M):
        # print('==== Currently at ', pos)
        instruction = input().split()
        # print('instruction : ', i)
        if (result == 'Yes'):
            continue
        instruction[1] = int(instruction[1])
        if (instruction[0] == 'E'):
            move = ('x', instruction[1])
        elif (instruction[0] == 'W'):
            move = ('x', -1*instruction[1])
        elif (instruction[0] == 'N'):
            move = ('y', instruction[1])
        elif (instruction[0] == 'S'):
            move = ('y', -1*instruction[1])
        else:
            raise NotImplementedError

        # print('>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> pos: ', pos, ', move: ', move)
        jewelToRemove = []
        for jewel in jewelPositions:

            '''
            if ((move[0] == 'x') and (pos[1] == jewel[1]) and (pos[0] <= jewel[0] <= pos[0]+move[1])) \
                    or ((move[0] == 'y') and (pos[0] == jewel[0]) and (pos[1] <= jewel[1] <= pos[1]+move[1])):
            '''


            if ((move[0] == 'x') and (pos[1] == jewel[1]) and (between(0, move[1], jewel[0]-pos[0]))) \
                    or ((move[0] == 'y') and (pos[0] == jewel[0]) and (between(0, move[1], jewel[1]-pos[1]))):
                # print('---- Collecting a jewel at ', jewel)
                # jewelPositions.remove(jewel)
                jewelToRemove.append(jewel)
            else:
                # print('xxxx Jewel not collected at ', jewel)
                pass

        for jewel in jewelToRemove:
            jewelPositions.remove(jewel)

        if (move[0] == 'x'):
            pos[0] += move[1]
        elif (move[0] == 'y'):
            pos[1] += move[1]

        if not jewelPositions:
            """
            if empty,
            all jewels are collected
            """
            result = 'Yes'
        else:
            pass
        # print('jewels are left at ', jewelPositions)
    print(result)

#!/usr/bin/python3

while True:
    n = int(input())
    if n == 0 : break

    gems = []
    for i in range(n):
        gem = tuple(map(int, input().split()))
        gems.append(gem)
    
    m = int(input())
    bot = [10, 10]
    history = [(10, 10)]
    for j in range(m):
        move = list(input().split())
        move[1] = int(move[1])
        if move[0] == 'N':
            index = 1 #y
            direc = 1 # pos
        elif move[0] == 'S':
            index = 1
            direc = -1 # neg
        elif move[0] == 'E':
            index = 0 #x
            direc = 1
        else: #W
            index = 0
            direc = -1
        for j in range(abs(move[1])):
            bot[index] += direc
            history.append(tuple(bot))
    f = True
    for g in gems:
        if g not in history:
            f = False
            break
    print("Yes" if f else "No")
